info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 7:06PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Fremont, western Jefferson, north central Bannock, southeastern Butte, northeastern Power, northwestern Bonneville and western Bingham Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 705 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Hamer to 9 miles west of Roberts to 10 miles east of Southeast Inl to Taber to Rockford to Fort Hall Buffalo Lodge to near Portneuf Gap. Movement was northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pocatello, Terreton, eastern American Falls Reservoir, Chubbuck, Inkom, Mud Lake, Hamer, Fort Hall Buffalo Lodge, Fort Hall Eagle Lodge, Taber, Southeast Inl, Portneuf Gap, Fort Hall Townsite, Springfield, Rockford, Moreland, Pingree, Pocatello Airport, Fort Hall Putnam Lodge and East Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
